trans-unit.target: 在目前的初始化方法呼叫之前已經初始化提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 取得無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試的成員資格使用者遭到鎖定之前允許的數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>可搭配<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>為了防範不必要的來源的密碼或密碼解答的重複嘗試透過成員資格使用者的猜測。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property within the number of minutes identified by the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> property to `true` until the user is unlocked with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果的無效密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目大於或等於值<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性的值所識別的分鐘數內<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>屬性，則成員資格使用者已鎖定設定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>屬性`true`直到使用者才能解除鎖定與<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a valid password is supplied before the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> value is reached, the counters that track the number of invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前提供有效的密碼，則<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>到達值時，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a valid password answer is supplied before the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> value is reached, only the counter that tracks the number of invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前提供有效的密碼解答<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>到達值時，只會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> keeps counts of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>分別保留無效的密碼嘗試次數與無效的密碼解答嘗試計數。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼嘗試只在遞增密碼嘗試計數器中的結果。

trans-unit.source: Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼解答嘗試只在遞增密碼解答計數器中的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property value is set in the application configuration using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the configuration section.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`組態區段的屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼或密碼解答嘗試的成員資格使用者遭到鎖定之前允許的數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum number of special characters that must be present in a valid password.
trans-unit.target: 取得有效的密碼中必須要有的特殊字元的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: The MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters property returns the minimum number of special, non-alphabetic characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters 屬性會傳回必須輸入要建立的有效密碼的特殊、 非字母字元的最小數目<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters 屬性值設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A non-alphanumeric character is a character for which the <xref:System.Char.IsLetterOrDigit%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 非英數字元是字元的<xref:System.Char.IsLetterOrDigit%2A>方法會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Char.IsLetterOrDigit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of special characters that must be present in a valid password.
trans-unit.target: 有效的密碼中必須要有的特殊字元數目下限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum length required for a password.
trans-unit.target: 取得密碼所需的最小長度。

trans-unit.source: MinRequiredPasswordLength property gets the minimum number of characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: MinRequiredPasswordLength 屬性會取得必須輸入要建立的有效密碼的字元數目下限<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum length required for a password.
trans-unit.target: 密碼所需的最小長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time window between which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answers are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 取得之間的連續的時間範圍以提供有效的密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數會追蹤失敗。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordAttemptWindow property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or the password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts.
trans-unit.target: PasswordAttemptWindow 屬性可搭配<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>內容，協助防範不必要的來源的密碼或密碼解答，重複嘗試透過成員資格使用者的猜測。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者嘗試登入、 變更其密碼，或重設其密碼時，請指定的時間間隔內允許只有特定數目的連續嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The length of the time window is specified by the PasswordAttemptWindow property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts.
trans-unit.target: PasswordAttemptWindow 屬性，用來識別不正確的嘗試之間所允許的分鐘數所指定的時間間隔長度。

trans-unit.source: If the number of consecutive failed attempts that a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the PasswordAttemptWindow property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果連續嘗試失敗次數，可讓使用者重設他或她密碼等於中儲存的值<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性，以及時間後經過無效上次是少於 PasswordAttemptWindow 的屬性所指定的分鐘數，則藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user can be unlocked by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以藉由呼叫解除鎖定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the PasswordAttemptWindow property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的失敗的嘗試和上一次的失敗的嘗試之間的間隔大於 PasswordAttemptWindow 屬性設定值，目前不正確的嘗試都會計算為第一個。

trans-unit.source: If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前允許的無效嘗試次數上限為止，請提供有效的密碼解答，無效的密碼解答嘗試計數是設定為零。

trans-unit.source: If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許無效的最大數目之前提供有效的密碼嘗試次數達到時，不正確的密碼嘗試次數的計數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數設定為零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> keeps count of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>分別保留無效的密碼嘗試次數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼嘗試只在遞增密碼嘗試計數器中的結果。

trans-unit.source: Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼解答嘗試只在遞增密碼解答計數器中的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> property value is set in the application configuration using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the configuration section.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordAttemptWindow`組態區段的屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answers are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 時間視窗中，以分鐘為單位，期間的連續失敗嘗試提供有效的密碼或密碼解答追蹤。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 10 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the PasswordAttemptWindow property setting, each failed attempt is treated as if it were the first failed attempt.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的失敗的嘗試和上一次的失敗的嘗試之間的間隔大於 PasswordAttemptWindow 屬性設定值，每個失敗的嘗試會被視為就像是第一次嘗試失敗。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server membership database.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示將密碼儲存在 SQL Server 成員資料庫的格式。

trans-unit.source: Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Hashed`僅`Clear`和`Encrypted`並未受到保護。

trans-unit.source: `Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: `Hashed`密碼已雜湊使用單向雜湊演算法和隨機產生的 salt 值儲存在資料庫中。

trans-unit.source: When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證密碼時，它會將雜湊驗證的資料庫中的 salt 值。

trans-unit.source: Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。

trans-unit.source: `Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: `Encrypted`密碼不安全的因為的缺口都可顯示您的資料庫內容，也可以公開加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed.
trans-unit.target: 這表示可以解密加密的密碼，並且公開。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordFormat value is specified in the section of the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中指定的 PasswordFormat 值。

trans-unit.source: `Encrypted` and `Hashed` passwords are encrypted or hashed by default based on information supplied in the element in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: `Encrypted`和`Hashed`密碼會加密，或您的組態中的項目中所提供的資訊為基礎的預設雜湊。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you specify a value of `3DES` for the `validation` attribute, or if no value is specified, hashed passwords will be hashed using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果您指定的值`3DES`如`validation`屬性，或如果未不指定任何值，雜湊的密碼將會使用雜湊<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>演算法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>

trans-unit.source: A custom hash algorithm can be defined using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用來定義自訂的雜湊演算法`hashAlgorithmType`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: If you choose encryption, default password encryption uses AES.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇加密時，預設的密碼加密使用 AES。

trans-unit.source: You can change the encryption algorithm by setting the `decryption` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更加密演算法設定`decryption`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are encrypting passwords, you must provide an explicit value for the `decryptionKey` attribute in the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要加密的密碼，您必須提供明確的值為`decryptionKey`項目中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value of `AutoGenerate` for the `decryptionKey` attribute is not supported when using encrypted passwords with ASP.NET Membership.
trans-unit.target: 預設值`AutoGenerate`如`decryptionKey`使用加密密碼與 ASP.NET 成員資格時，不支援屬性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat> values, indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat>值，表示將密碼儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫中的格式。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat>

trans-unit.source: Gets the regular expression used to evaluate a password.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來評估密碼的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordStrengthRegularExpression property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: PasswordStrengthRegularExpression 屬性取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: A regular expression used to evaluate a password.
trans-unit.target: 用來評估密碼的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the SQL Server membership provider is configured to require the user to answer a password question for password reset and retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否要將 SQL Server 的成員資格提供者設定為要求使用者回答密碼問題，密碼重設和擷取。

trans-unit.source: Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password.
trans-unit.target: 需要密碼問題和解答，提供額外的安全性時擷取，或重設使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to retrieve or reset a forgotten password.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用者名稱時，使用者可以提供問題和解答，稍後可以用來擷取或重設忘記的密碼。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> property are both `false`, the value of the RequiresQuestionAndAnswer property is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A>屬性都`false`，RequiresQuestionAndAnswer 屬性的值不相關。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a password answer is required for password reset and retrieval; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果密碼解答才能重設密碼和擷取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the SQL Server membership provider is configured to require a unique e-mail address for each user name.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否要將 SQL Server 的成員資格提供者設定為每個使用者名稱需要唯一的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the membership provider requires a unique e-mail address; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成員資格提供者需要唯一的電子郵件地址。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的密碼重設為自動產生新密碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class to reset the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config) to a new, randomly generated value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>重設為新的 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的密碼類別隨機產生的值。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>

trans-unit.source: The new password is returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的密碼。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The random password created by the ResetPassword method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ResetPassword 方法所建立的隨機密碼不保證傳遞規則運算式中的<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 不過，隨機密碼將會符合所建立的準則<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ResetPassword method is most commonly used when the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordFormat%2A> property is set to `Hashed`.
trans-unit.target: ResetPassword 方法為大多數常用時<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordFormat%2A>屬性設定為`Hashed`。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a user forgets a password that is hashed, the password cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者忘記的密碼雜湊，則無法擷取密碼。

trans-unit.source: However, the provider can reset the password to a new, automatically generated password if the user supplies the correct password answer.
trans-unit.target: 不過，提供者可以將密碼重設為自動產生新密碼如果使用者提供正確的密碼解答。

trans-unit.source: If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the ResetPassword method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ResetPassword 方法以提供不正確的密碼解答，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試次數的內部計數器會遞增一。

trans-unit.source: This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供正確的密碼解答，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的內部計數器會重設為零。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the ResetPassword method directly by first obtaining a reference to the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> instance from the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在第一次取得<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider><xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>類別</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership></xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A>執行個體</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>的參考來直接呼叫 ResetPassword 方法

trans-unit.source: The generated password will be at least 14 characters long, or the length specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property, and will contain the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 產生的密碼將會至少 14 個字元長，或在指定長度<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>屬性，而且會包含在指定的非英數字元數目<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The password is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression contained in the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property, if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: 不保證傳遞規則運算式中包含密碼<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性，如果指定的其中一個。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。

trans-unit.source: The user to reset the password for.
trans-unit.target: 要重設密碼的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The password answer for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者的密碼解答。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset*>is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset*>

trans-unit.source: An unhandled exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生未處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Clears the user's locked-out status so that the membership user can be validated.
trans-unit.target: 清除使用者的鎖定狀態，以驗證成員資格使用者。

trans-unit.source: Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method when the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> is exceeded within the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者最常鎖定且無法驗證所<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法時<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>超過內<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 開頭和尾端空白會刪減`username`參數值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the membership user to clear the locked-out status for.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除的鎖定狀態的成員資格使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成員資格使用者已成功解除鎖定。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is also returned if the user does not exist in the database.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>也會傳回，如果使用者不存在資料庫中。

trans-unit.source: username is an empty string, is longer than 256 characters, or contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: username為空字串，長度超過 256 個字元，或包含逗號。

trans-unit.source: username is .
trans-unit.target: usernameis .

trans-unit.source: Updates information about a user in the SQL Server membership database.
trans-unit.target: 更新 SQL Server 的成員資格資料庫中的使用者相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class to update user information for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>更新 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的使用者資訊的類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Email%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Comment%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> property values are updated for the specified membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Email%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Comment%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>屬性值也會更新指定的成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Comment%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Email%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum length for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A> property is 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 最大長度<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>屬性為 256 個字元。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum length for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Email%2A> property is 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 最大長度<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Email%2A>屬性為 256 個字元。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Email%2A>

trans-unit.source: The password for a membership user cannot be updated using the UpdateUser method.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用 UpdateUser 方法來更新成員資格使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: To update the password for a membership user, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ChangePassword%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新成員資格使用者的密碼，請使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ChangePassword%2A>方法的<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ChangePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object that represents the user to update and the updated information for the user.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>物件，表示使用者更新和使用者的更新的資訊。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified user name and password exist in the SQL Server membership database.
trans-unit.target: 確認指定的使用者名稱和密碼存在於 SQL Server 成員資料庫。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class to validate user information for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>驗證 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的使用者資訊的類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>

trans-unit.source: When a user is successfully validated, the last activity date and last sign-in date values are updated to the current date and time in the database.
trans-unit.target: 成功驗證使用者，也會為目前的日期和時間在資料庫中的更新的上次活動日期和最後一個登入日期值。

trans-unit.source: If an incorrect password is supplied to the ValidateUser method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one.
trans-unit.target: 如果不正確的密碼提供給 ValidateUser 方法，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試次數的內部計數器會遞增一。

trans-unit.source: This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供正確的密碼，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則內部計數器該追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified username and password are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的使用者名稱和密碼是有效的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is also returned if the user does not exist in the database.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>也會傳回，如果使用者不存在資料庫中。
